matter how many pep talks Page gives. Global Equities Research analyst Trip Chowdry suggested that Google's unsuccessful$ 6 billion bid to buy Groupon may have been another source of tension. Now the entire franchise has gone to the land of Stepford, where everybody is so nice and sweet and happy and zippy, you feel a cavity coming on. Steven Tyler is "about as critical as a fourth-grade music teacher," while Jennifer Lopez , trying to fill the sympathetic Paula Abdul role, supposedly has trouble saying no, but "even this feels manufactured" and disingenous.
